title: Reconstructing Online Science Learning Experiences in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment requiring enhanced learner interaction, with continuous learning improvement through formative assessment feedback

learning_goals: Learners can share scientific problem-solving processes with peers and provide feedback using online collaboration tools.
Learners can explore virtual simulations of science experiment principles through constructivist learning activities on a smartphone-based LMS.
Learners can self-directively revise learning strategies and create learning plans based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
